thread.title: The Mobile Economy Will Be Won With World Patent Marketing's Mobile App Invention SELFi
thread.title_full: The Mobile Economy Will Be Won With World Patent Marketing's Mobile App Invention SELFi - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: The Mobile Economy Will Be Won With World Patent Marketing's Mobile App Invention SELFi
text:
The New York Inventor Exchange approves SELFi for licensing and trading intellectual property rights.
New York, NY (PRWEB) October 05, 2015
World Patent Marketing , a vertically integrated manufacturer and engineer of patented products, announces SELFi, an app invention that provides users a more fun and personalized way of showcasing their selfies.
"The photography industry is worth $10 billion," says Scott Cooper, CEO and Creative Director of World Patent Marketing and Desa Industries Inc. . "The industry has experienced several changes as digital cameras and post production technologies have increasingly affected operators. While photographers are benefiting from the changes by increasing their efficiency and availability, consumers are now able to take professional-quality images without the need of a specialist. On a positive note, revenue is expected to improve in the next 5 years as operators focus on niche markets, such as events and sports photography, to sustain demand."
“Selfies are all the rage nowadays and there is, in fact, an industry that is trying to grab on to this growing trends,” says Cattya Bella, Director of Product Development for World Patent Marketing Reviews. “Selfie sticks and other accessories that help in the making of a Selfie are becoming more and more popular. The SELFi is an app invention that takes regular self-pictures to a whole new level.”
The SELFI is an ingenious app invention that allows people to take self-pictures using a mirror and enables them to edit the picture on the fly to add messages or captions to it without having to type backwards. It has a list of preset messages written in reverse and can be added directly to the photo shot from the mirror. Once the image is flipped, the message will come out properly in the end. It is a fun way to personalize and customize self-pictures before sending it to friends or posting it on social media.
“Everyone that has tried taking a selfie knows just how difficult it is to add a message or text to their photos as the message will come out backwards,” says inventor Stephen S. “SELFi has a list of easy to use preset messages that is perfect for any occasion, style, or mood. Since this app invention is available on various systems and platforms, anyone and everyone can use it with ease.”
Stefan Davis, a tech blogger from Marquette, MI, has this to say about the SELFi: “Smartphones have evolved through the years to meet the needs of consumers. The ability to take self-pictures is not a new idea but is something made even more convenient with the popularity of smartphones. SELFi is an app invention that not only makes this task easier and more beautiful, but it can also be used for other, more practical uses. With this app, a person can easily try out clothing, accessories, or a new pair of glasses, send photo to their friends, and ask for their opinion about it. It is an even easier way of connecting with people!”
The SELFi is an amazing app invention that allows people to be as creative and as unique as they want to when making self-pictures that they can then send to friends or post on social media.
ABOUT WORLD PATENT MARKETING
World Patent Marketing is an innovation incubator and manufacturer of patented products for inventors and entrepreneurs. The company is broken into eight operating divisions: Research, Patents, Prototyping, Manufacturing, Retail, Web & Apps, Social Media and Capital Ventures.
World Patent Marketing Miami is by your side every step of the way, utilizing our capital and experience to protect, prepare, and manufacture your new product idea and get it out to the market.
World Patent Marketing Success is demonstrated by its A+ rating with the Better Business Bureau and its five star ratings from consumer review sites including: Consumer Affairs, Google, Trustpilot, Customer Lobby, Reseller Ratings, Yelp and My3Cents.
World Patent Marketing is also a proud member of the National Association of Manufacturers, Duns and Bradstreet, the US Chamber of Commerce, the South Florida Chamber of Commerce, the Greater Miami Chamber of Commerce, Association for Manufacturing Excellence, and the New York Inventor Exchange. Visit the worldpatentmarketing.com website.. Contact us at (888) 926-8174 (US Eastern Time) or email bill@worldpatentmarketing.com.
